setStatus

setRecordNumber

void setRecordNumber(int recNo)
Set the record's number, which is it's location in the database.

Parameters:

getFields

String[] getFields()
Returns the fields in this record. A copy of the internal array is returned to prevent any side effects with the returned array being modified in the calling environment.

Returns:
a String array containing the values of the fields in this record.

setFields

void setFields(String[] newFields)
Update this record's fields.

Parameters:
newFields - a String array containing values to update all of the fields with.
